title: Property_Calc
summary: Property_Calc is a React web app that helps users find real estate and calculate mortgage payments. It uses Zillow's API for property data and Google Maps for location visualization. Users can search properties and customize mortgage calculations with different parameters like taxes and down payments.

title: GenThrust
summary: GenThrust is a WordPress-based aviation website that manages airplane parts data through a secure, role-based login system. Built with Elementor, it uses plugins like MemberPress and ACF to provide authorized users access to a specialized parts database.

title: Xiobook
summary: Xiobook is a WordPress-based accounting platform where freelancers can offer their services. Built with Elementor and enhanced with WooCommerce, it facilitates secure transactions and client communication while maintaining strong SEO through Rank Math.
